item.title: How Far Does the Apple Fall From the Tree?
item.description: Introduction During the 4th of July I started to have this question: which of my ancestors served in the Revolutionary War? I began my search for records of proof of service on FamilySearch and Ancestry. As I was clicking up and down my family tree, I wondered if there was a way to read the family history (GEDCOM) files in R. After an in-depth search, I couldnâ€™t find anyone with a good GEDCOM parser that would turn it into CSV format in R (however, a similar project was recently begun; https://www.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
